ygData.subject: Learning and consequences - Nightlight

Subject: Learning and consequences - Nightlight

NIGHTLIGHT and DARK RODIMUS appeared in a rather spacious chamber,
obviously some sort of transporting chamber of some sort, at least
judging by the platform they were standing on.

A figure was stadning at the controls watching them carefully. He
looked much like the predacon DINOBOT II, including the mechanical as
well as organic sides of his face and the sneer that was on his lips.

"You have returned Dark Rodimus." the figure said as he stepped out,
standing taller than most. "And you have brought us a present."

"No Rapticon, I have brought myself a gift. My wife, and she will
remain mine!" DARK RODIMUS held on to her firmly.

There was a wicked and toothy smile from RAPTICON as he bowed his
head, "Ahh, as you say then." He looked up at NIGHTLIGHT, his more
mechanical optic glowing red for a moment as if scanning her. "They
want to see you." He said to DARK RODIMUS.

DARK RODIMUS nodded, "I had assumed as much."

RAPTICON tilted his head to once again look at NIGHTLIGHT more fully,
"Shall I hold your gift for you . . . watch over her?"

"No!" DARK RODIMUS said with a firm authority, "She is with me."

There was a faint look of disappointment in his optics but RAPTICON
nodded, "Of course." he said as he turned back to the console, pressed
a button and the door to the room slid open. He smiled again looking
almost hungrilly at NIGHTLIGHT.

(TAG)

Preston
